title: Grazia Magazine
content:
Does anyone know the font used for Grazia? the weekly fashion mag?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121207152310im_/http:/typophile.com/files/11111_3791.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121207152310im_/http:/typophile.com/files/site_logo_4209.gif)
author: adamtovey

comments.content: It's a Didot, maybe by Robert Alonso.
does anyone know if Robert Alonso has a personal site, or a site for BA Graphics?
